full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### [English]
Inductively Coupled Plasma - Optical Emission Spectrometer (ICP-OES)

#### [French]
Plasma à couplage inductif - spectromètre d'émission optique (ICP-OES)

**Tender Details**
------------------

* **RFx ID**: PW-23-01020356
* **Title**: Inductively Coupled Plasma - Optical Emission Spectrometer (ICP-OES)
* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other international trade agreements
* **Region of Opportunity**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Region of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

**End User Requirements**
------------------------

The Emergencies Science and Technology Section of Environment Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the purchase of one (1) Inductively Coupled Plasma - Optical Emission Spectrometer (ICP-OES) for the analysis of multiple trace elements in environmental, geochemical, and petrochemical samples. The instrument will be used to conduct research into the analysis of multiple trace elements in crude oils and petroleum oil products, in accordance with ASTM D5708 Test Method A or ASTM D7691.

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

* **English**: 2023-02-20T14:00:00 (14:00 EST)

**Attachments**
--------------

The tender document is available for download at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/09/b07f1b87236c8796ee30953bea7293cc/5000068560_npp_apm.pdf

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Alexandra Ghiatau:
* Email: alexandra.ghiatau@ec.gc.ca
* Phone: 438-801-0771

Note: I have rewritten the text in a more professional and concise manner, while removing irrelevant information. I have also rephrased certain sections to improve clarity and readability. The rewritten text adheres to the original 400-word limit and is presented in a clear and easy-to-read markdown format.
